testcase.classname: Vehicle registration check based on the input test data files from /src/test/resources/testdata folder filtered by xlsx and csv format
testcase.name: Registration Numbers are passed one by one to the dvla page and
testcase.system-out: Given I navigate to the vehicle search page.................................passed And start the vehicle check.................................................passed Then verify all the vehicles in 'xlsx,csv' files from the list of files.....passed

testcase.name: ViewVehicle page text information
testcase.system-out: Given I navigate to the vehicle search home page............................passed When I should see the searchpage............................................passed Then I should see the page title as "Enter the registration number of the vehicle".passed

testcase.name: continue button appears on the vehicle search home page
testcase.system-out: Given I navigate to the vehicle search home page............................passed When I should see the searchpage............................................passed Then I should see the button text as "Continue".............................passed

testcase.name: user provides valid registration number
testcase.system-out: Given I navigate to the vehicle search home page............................passed When I should see the searchpage............................................passed When I provide the registration number as "OV10JPX".........................passed And I click the continue button.............................................passed Then I should now see the vehicle confirmation page.........................passed And I should see the color as "silver"......................................passed And I should see the make as "volvo"........................................passed

testcase.name: user provides valid registration number 2
testcase.system-out: Given I navigate to the vehicle search home page............................passed When I should see the searchpage............................................passed When I provide the registration number as "PL05XRU".........................passed And I click the continue button.............................................passed Then I should now see the vehicle confirmation page.........................passed And I should see the color as "silver"......................................passed And I should see the make as "toyota".......................................passed

testcase.name: user provides invalid registration number
testcase.system-out: Given I navigate to the vehicle search home page............................passed When I should see the searchpage............................................passed When I provide the registration number as "GV65RRR".........................passed And I click the continue button.............................................passed Then I should see the text on vehicle confirmation page as "Vehicle details could not be found".passed

testcase.name: get-vehicle-information-from-dvla home page' text information
testcase.system-out: Given I navigate to the vehicle information check homepage..................passed When I see the homepage is visible..........................................passed Then I should see the title as "Get vehicle information from DVLA"..........passed And I should see the text as "Check online to find out what information the Driver and Vehicle Licensing Agency (DVLA) holds about a vehicle.".passed And I should also see the text as "You’ll need the vehicle’s registration number.".passed

testcase.name: start-now button appears on the homepage
testcase.system-out: Given I navigate to the vehicle information check homepage..................passed When I see the homepage is visible..........................................passed Then I should see the button with text as "Start now".......................passed

testcase.name: clicking the start now button redirects to vehicle searchpage
testcase.system-out: Given I navigate to the vehicle information check homepage..................passed When I see the homepage is visible..........................................passed When I click the start now button...........................................passed Then I should see the vehiclesearchpage.....................................passed
